scripts.test:heavy: bun run test:heavy:cli && bun run test:heavy:visual

scripts.phase-a:gate:metadata-contract: bun scripts/phase-a/verify-gate-scaffold.mjs metadata-contract && bunx vitest run --project hq --project plugin-plugins --testNamePattern='metadata contract gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gate:import-boundary: bun scripts/phase-a/verify-gate-scaffold.mjs import-boundary && bunx vitest run --project hq --project plugin-plugins --testNamePattern='import boundary gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gate:host-composition-guard: bun scripts/phase-a/verify-gate-scaffold.mjs host-composition-guard && bunx vitest run --project server --testNamePattern='host composition guard gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gate:route-negative-assertions: bun scripts/phase-a/verify-gate-scaffold.mjs route-negative-assertions && bunx vitest run --project server --testNamePattern='route negative assertions gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gate:observability-contract: bun scripts/phase-a/verify-gate-scaffold.mjs observability-contract && bunx vitest run --project server --testNamePattern='observability contract gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gate:legacy-metadata-hard-delete: bun scripts/phase-a/check-forbidden-legacy-metadata-keys.mjs packages/hq/src/workspace/plugins.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/lib/workspace-plugins.ts packages/hq/src/install/state.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/lib/install-state.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/web/enable.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/web/enable/all.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/cli/install/all.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/scaffold/web-plugin.ts plugins/*/*/package.json && bunx vitest run --project hq --project plugin-plugins --testNamePattern='forbidden legacy metadata keys gate scaffold'

bun scripts/phase-a/check-forbidden-legacy-metadata-keys.mjs --allow-findings packages/hq/src/workspace/plugins.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/lib/workspace-plugins.ts packages/hq/src/install/state.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/lib/install-state.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/web/enable.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/web/enable/all.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/cli/install/all.ts plugins/cli/plugins/src/commands/plugins/scaffold/web-plugin.ts plugins/*/*/package.json && bunx vitest run --project hq --project plugin-plugins --testNamePattern='forbidden legacy metadata keys gate scaffold'
scripts.phase-a:gates:baseline: bun run phase-a:gate:metadata-contract && bun run phase-a:gate:import-boundary && bun run phase-a:gate:manifest-smoke-baseline && bun run phase-a:gate:host-composition-guard && bun run phase-a:gate:route-negative-assertions && bun run phase-a:gate:harness-matrix && bun run phase-a:gate:observability-contract && (bun run phase-a:telemetry:optional || true)
scripts.phase-a:gates:completion: bun run phase-a:gate:metadata-contract && bun run phase-a:gate:import-boundary && bun run phase-a:gate:manifest-smoke-completion && bun run phase-a:gate:host-composition-guard && bun run phase-a:gate:route-negative-assertions && bun run phase-a:gate:harness-matrix && bun run phase-a:gate:observability-contract && (bun run phase-a:telemetry:optional || true)
